author: kkolinko
msg: Do not raise EOFException if filling the necessary count of bytes into buffer requires several iterations.
Do not update count if in.read() returned -1.

author: sarowe
msg: SOLR-6058: make detailed feature button text wrap within the button border, rather than breaking the border when the text has to wrap; move the solr ref guide badge in buttons closer to the left side
